* Better notifications for your Slow Chess games!

Hello ChessKids! In this update we added a completely new, fun design on the app's Play/Home screen!
It is easier to start new games & keep track of ongoing games.

We added 2 new daily features:
* Spin the Wheel - Make chess a daily habit. Just spin and earn stars!
* Daily Tip Video - Find FunMasterMike's video Tip of the Day at the bottom of the Home page.

We’ve added an easy-to-access message inbox with new features.
Finally, we’ve fixed many bugs & added performance improvements.

You can now easily rate us within the app, let us know what you think!

Hello ChessKids!

You asked, and we’ve delivered. Tournaments are now here!

Compete in official ChessKid Club tournaments and battle against kids from all around the world. Tournaments happen everyday and cover global time zones. Chess is about sportsmanship. Tell your opponent “good move,” or give them a trophy!

We’ve updated our settings page to make it easier than ever to make your moves or automatically promote to a Queen. Customize your controls to suit your style of play.

New sounds! We’ve also added a modern version of our theme song and sprinkled newer, updated sounds throughout the app.

Coming up soon: brand new video player. Soon, videos will be easier to view and more fun than ever!

We always love getting feedback from our fans, and you’ll be proud to know that you truly influence what we do.  
Thanks for being ChessKid users!

Dear ChessKids and Parents,

We continue to improve ChessKid, thanks in no small part to all of your amazing feedback! Thank you for your patience, as many of you expressed that Play vs. Bots was not working properly.
We’ve fixed it!

Other improvements we’ve made:
- Videos. Overall navigation improvements. Plus, you will LOVE new options like sorting by category or favorite author. Or visit FM Mike’s favorite videos!
- Modernized splash screen.
